page.title: 01A Day in the Life of Joanne
page.content: I get up at about eight o'clock and have a wash.After my wash I get dressed.I go downstairs and get my school bag ready.I go back upstairs and brush my teeth and comb my hair.At about twenty five past eight I go up to friend's house to walk to school with her.We sometimes go in the car,but mostly we walk.Whaen we get to school we walk around and talk.At five to nine the bell goes.We go in,take off our coats and go to our classes.I change my shoes and get out my Top Ten Metric Maths book.I do Top Ten and then the bell goes for assembly.We go into assembly and sing hymns,say prayers and listen to a story that the headmaster tells us.After assembly we mark Top Ten dand then do something like Maths or English.We go outside for a break at a twenty to eleven. continued on page 2.
